text: Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 61. I will not teach Dhamma to a person wearing non-leather footwear who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๑. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้สวมเขียงเท้า”
61. I shall not teach Dhamma to one wearing (wooden-soled) sandals who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
